attributes.action: Change the Planning Regulations to forbid the conversion of Type 1 Back to Back houses into multi occupancy homes or bed sits without prior planning permission being granted and to refuse all retrospective applications for work already done.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This pernicious practice is blighting deprived areas and destroying community cohesion across great swathes of the country.  The practice also puts the lives of tenants at risk because of inadequate fire exits and puts an unbearable strain on scare community resouces.
